about.Our company: Our company has been operating in the market since 1998. We quickly developed as a manufacturing plant producing a variety of products for different purposes. With the growing market demand for our products, we invested in the development of our machinery park to increase efficiency and improve the quality of our products.

automation.The modernization: The modernization of machines and equipment in terms of automation is a process of introducing modern technologies and solutions into existing machines and equipment to increase their level of automation and efficiency. It involves modifying, improving, or replacing parts, components, or systems in existing devices to enable them to operate fully or partially autonomously.

calculator.Do you want: Do you want to know the cost of our cutting services? Please fill out the form below and upload the appropriate file so that we can accurately estimate the cost and tailor the offer to your needs.

contact.Thank you: Thank you for your interest in our company! Please fill out the form below to get in touch with us. We will do our best to respond as soon as possible.

forms.Please fill: Please fill in the inquiry details so we can tailor the offer to your needs. Leave your contact details, and we will call you back to discuss your inquiry.

product.Error: Error - failed to load the model

about.We specialize: We specialize in tailoring customized automation solutions to the needs of various industries. Our company continues to achieve successive triumphs in project execution and building global partnerships. Together, we strive to enhance efficiency and automation in your company.
about.Thanks to: Thanks to a modern machine park, BAL Industry can efficiently manufacture various components while meeting the highest quality standards. We utilize advanced technologies and the expertise of specialists to meet our clients' expectations.
about.Thanks to our own experience: Thanks to our own experience, we have gained a deep understanding of the processes, challenges, and needs of manufacturing plants with a similar production profile, and we want to share this knowledge with others. We can help you increase efficiency and improve production quality.
about.Our offer: Our offer includes robotic workstations, transportation and storage systems, welding machines, and many other innovative machines. Thanks to this, we can comprehensively meet the diverse needs of our clients, providing them with top-level service.
about.Thanks to our continuous: Thanks to our continuous search for new technologies and working methods, we are able to create unique and advanced solutions that bring benefits to our clients.
about.Our company places: Our company places great emphasis on innovation and creativity. We strive to continuously develop pioneering solutions that bring value to our partners.
about.Quality is the foundation: Quality is the foundation of our business. All our products and services are carefully developed and thoroughly tested to ensure the highest level of satisfaction for our clients.
about.Working together: Working together enables us to achieve outstanding results and efficiently accomplish project goals.
about.We strive: We strive to create an inspiring environment that fosters the development of original concepts and innovative solutions.

automation.Installation of additional sensors: Installation of additional sensors, such as optical sensors, force sensors, and position sensors, which enable machines to collect data about the environment, operating conditions, or the product.
automation.Implementation of modern control: Implementation of modern control and automation systems, such as Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) or SCADA (Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition) systems, which enable programming, monitoring, and controlling the operation of machines and devices.
automation.Connecting machines: Connecting machines and devices with IT systems, such as Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) or Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems, enabling data exchange and integration of production processes.
automation.Implementation of solutions: Implementation of solutions aimed at reducing energy consumption, such as efficient motors, speed regulation, the use of renewable energy sources, and kinetic energy recovery.
automation.Implementation of industrial robots: Implementation of industrial robots or automation systems to perform specific operations or tasks within the production process. This may include assembly, welding, packaging, sorting, and many other activities.

calculator.Unfortunately: Unfortunately, the file preview is not available.
calculator.Please fill: Please fill in the contact details.
calculator.Your inquiry: Your inquiry has been successfully sent.
calculator.No model: No model has been configured. Please provide configuration data.
calculator.Provide us: Provide us with your details so we can contact you
calculator.Select a material from the list: Select a material from the list
calculator.Enter the target quantity of pieces: Enter the target quantity of pieces
calculator.Enter the material thickness for cutting: Enter the material thickness for cutting
calculator.What does: What does the optimal file look like?
calculator.An optimal file: An optimal file for laser cutting consists of a single part. All contours are closed, and the cutting contour color is white.
calculator.What should be: What should be taken into account?
calculator.The following points: The following points should be taken into account:
calculator.the file should contain: the file should contain only the cutting contour
calculator.there should be: there should be only one part per file
calculator.the file should not: the file should not contain additional data or information
calculator.when exporting: when exporting from a 3D program, other views should not be selected
calculator.the file should not contain: the file should not contain a drawing header
calculator.lines should be: lines should be white (red lines will not be cut)
calculator.A file containing: A file containing the following errors should not be submitted:
calculator.multiple parts in the same file: multiple parts in the same file
calculator.drag: drag and drop them here. Max. 8MB

homePage.Learn more about: Learn more about our machines with the catalog.
homePage.in the field: product portfolio in the field of robotics and automation
homePage.Are you curious: Are you curious about what makes our clients trust us so much? Take a look at the solutions we use.
homePage.Check out: Check out the equipment we work on and find out why we are the best! Quality is not just an empty phrase for us.
homePage.Discover: Discover our product offering designed for businesses of all sizes! Increase productivity in your company.
homePage.Want to: Want to start a collaboration or learn about our offerings? Use our calculator or fill out the contact form.
homePage.Fill out the offer form on our website: Fill out the offer form on our website.
homePage.We provide: We provide customized, industry-specific automation solutions. We successfully execute projects and build global partnerships. Together, we will improve efficiency and automation in your company.
homePage.Introducing: Introducing industrial robots or automation systems to perform specific operations or tasks within the production process. This may include assembly, welding, packaging, sorting, and many other activities.
homePage.A well-equipped: A well-equipped machine park enables efficient production, increases operational flexibility, and allows for the execution of various projects using appropriate tools and technologies.
homePage.We offer machines: We offer machines for processing flat surfaces. We design and deliver sheet metal storage systems, such as sheet bundle storage solutions, and storage solutions for elements along with transport pallets. We also offer high-temperature furnaces used in various technological processes.
homePage.Based on knowledge: Based on the knowledge and experience of our specialists, we tailor our services to the individual needs and requirements of our customers, providing them with professional service and satisfaction with the achieved results.

offert.Comprehensive Welding Services: Comprehensive Welding Services - MIG/MAG and TIG
offert.BAL Industry is a modern company: BAL Industry is a modern company specializing, among other things, in providing welding services using MIG/MAG and TIG methods, both manually and robotically. Our experience, skilled workforce, and extensive machine facilities enable us to handle even the most demanding projects, regardless of the scale. BAL Industry offers services based on customer-supplied parts or complete project execution based on technical documentation.
offert.Comprehensive MIG/MAG and TIG Welding Se: Comprehensive MIG/MAG and TIG Welding Services - Manual and Robotic
offert.Ability to work with various materials: Ability to work with various materials: carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum
offert.Robotic welding cells: Robotic welding cells ensuring repeatability and efficiency
offert.Ideal for serial and mass production: Ideal for serial and mass production
offert.For Complete Product Execution, We Offer: For Complete Product Execution, We Offer:
offert.Precise cutting: Precise cutting of steel, stainless steel, and aluminum sheets
offert.Milling, turning, drilling with high dim: Milling, turning, drilling with high dimensional accuracy
offert.Modern press brakes: Modern press brakes allow precise bending of even complex shapes
offert.Manual or robotic: Manual or robotic, tailored to project requirements
offert.In-house painting: In-house painting facilities: powder coating and wet paint shops
offert.Production of Welding Workstations: Production of Welding Workstations - Manual and Robotic
offert.As a manufacturer: As a manufacturer, BAL Industry also offers the design, fabrication, and integration of custom welding workstations that improve efficiency and ergonomics in our clients' facilities.
offert.Option for integration: Option for integration with exhaust and ventilation systems
offert.Equipped with: Equipped with appropriate power sources and accessories - ready for unit or maintenance production
offert.Complete cells: Complete cells and welding lines with industrial and collaborative robots
offert.Programming, commissioning: Programming, commissioning, and operator training included
offert.*Each workstation: *Each workstation is individually designed based on a detailed analysis of the client's requirements, considering safety standards as well as ergonomic and production needs.
offert.BAL Industry - Technology That Unites Yo: BAL Industry - Technology That Unites Your Production
offert.Whether you need: Whether you need a one-off welding task, want to modernize your production line, or are looking to equip your facility with advanced MIG/MAG or TIG workstations - BAL Industry delivers tailor-made solutions.
offert.from design: from design through production to final painting
offert.robotic welding systems, CNC, paint shop: robotic welding systems, CNC, paint shops
offert.customer-supplied: customer-supplied materials or complete in-house production
offert.solutions tailored: solutions tailored to your production needs
offert.In the era of Industry: In the era of Industry 4.0, the reliability, precision, and efficiency of production processes are more important than ever before. BAL Industry responds to these needs by offering comprehensive solutions and equipment for laser welding, cutting, and surface cleaning.
offert.We are a modern company: We are a modern company specializing in both manual and robotic laser services. Thanks to our advanced technological infrastructure, we provide end-to-end project executionâ€”from working with parts supplied by the client to manufacturing components from scratch based on technical drawings.
offert.Precise and durable: Precise and durable joining of metal elements, from thin-walled to thicker components
offert.High-quality, aesthetic welds: High-quality, aesthetic welds with no need for additional finishing
offert.Available as manual welding: Available as manual welding (for single or non-standard items) and robotic welding (for larger series)
offert.Processing possible: Processing possible on both customer-supplied elements and parts manufactured by BAL Industry
offert.Fast, clean: Fast, clean, and repeatable cutting of steel and stainless steel sheets
offert.Execution based: Execution based on a technical drawing or a pattern provided by the client
offert.High precision: High precision that minimizes material waste
offert.Removal of rust: Removal of rust, paint coatings, and contaminants from metal surfaces without damaging the material structure
offert.An excellent alternative: An excellent alternative to aggressive chemical and mechanical method
offert.BAL Industry is not just: BAL Industry is not just a service provider but a full-scope solutions partner for automation and robotics. We design and implement robotic production cells tailored to each client's specific needs, including:
offert.Our solutions: Our solutions are based on proven technologies and industrial controllers.
offert.Thanks to a modern: Thanks to a modern machine park and a team of experienced specialists, BAL Industry offers:
offert.Processing of: Processing of components provided by the client
offert.Complete in-house: Complete in-house production: from cutting parts from suitable materials (carbon steel, stainless steel), CNC machining, and bending, to welding
offert.Option to finish: Option to finish parts in our own powder and wet paint shops
offert.Preliminary concepts: Preliminary concepts, further developed by our design team
